name: Superhero Action Figure
description: This action figure features a popular superhero character with superpowers. It is highly articulated and comes with interchangeable accessories for versatile play.

name: Ninja Warrior Playset
description: Enter the world of stealth and adventure with this ninja warrior playset. It includes action figures, weapons, and a customizable training ground for exciting ninja battles.

name: Battle Mech Robot
description: Take control of this powerful battle mech robot and engage in epic robot battles. It features lights, sound effects, and projectile launchers for action-packed play.

name: Galactic Spaceship Set
description: Embark on interstellar missions with this galactic spaceship set. It includes a spaceship, astronauts, alien creatures, and various accessories for space exploration adventures.

name: Dinosaur Adventure Playset
description: Travel back in time with this dinosaur adventure playset. It features realistic dinosaur figures, a jungle environment, and interactive elements for exciting prehistoric expeditions.

name: Pirate Ship Playset
description: Sail the high seas with this pirate ship playset. It includes a pirate ship, pirate figures, treasure chests, and a working cannon for swashbuckling adventures and treasure hunts.
